modShortDescription: Extender for original ZMXuiCPBBMxxl addon, which provide balance and adaptation to PackMule Perk, GodMode, Steroids and Poket Mods.
modDescription:
Extender for original [ZMXuiCPBBMxxl](https://7daystodiemods.com/zmxuicpbbmxxl-the-120-slot-backpack-extension-mod/) addon, which provide balance and adaptation to PackMule Perk, GodMode, Steroids and Poket Mods.

This version is for 120 slots addon.

**Layout:**

* 36 slots avaliable from start. (Red)
* 60 slots will unlockable by PackMule [Perk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/). (Green)
* 24 slots will be unlockable by Poket Mods. (Blue)

**[Download](https://mega.nz/file/Q8cQRbxI#FgNAhmiSqG2T9tvpJAi1Aq8KAq26W37HoWJ9MvmzcKQ)** from Mega  
**[Download](https://github.com/G1ID30N/ZMXuiCPBBMxxlPB/releases/latest/download/ZMXuiCPBBMxxlPB.zip)** from GitHub

If you need help, you can use this [support link](http://discordapp.com/users/G1D30N#5198).

**Credits:** [G1D30N](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/g1d30n/)
